name: ATMA VANI WELFARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: Atma Vani is an organization upholding Humanitarian  values and Work for the transformation of lives in India without discrimination in caste, creed or race, to uplift and educate the poor and to train them in an occupation which would give them a measure of independence and self-esteem.Atma Vani is working for upliftment for poor and needy people for bringing them to main stream society by providing Health, Education, training and basic needs especially for the development of children & women.
